ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I m looking for the best post-crawl report/log/file from which to extract the crawl begin & end times. I was using the first & last lines of crawl.log

Subject: crawl start & end times
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=241416423

Hello,

I'm looking for the best post-crawl report/log/file from which to
extract the crawl begin & end times. I was using the first & last
lines of crawl.log for these times but then I noticed that the time
for the first ARC record occurs slightly before the date for the first
line in the crawl.log. Is there a better place from which to get these
dates so that all the ARC record dates will fall within them?

thanks,
Andrea
